Example project with the problem, at least on my Eclipse installation.
Note: I upgraded to the latest dev build of AJDT on Eclipse 3.1.1 and I don't see the problem. So it's probably already fixed in MAIN.

I couldn't reproduce this but I've added a null check, so it should be fixed. 
Please re-open if not.  Fixed in the following builds:
